gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 132, Trail Blazers 127
gameRecap.excerpt: The Clippers defeated the Trail Blazers, 132-127. Kawhi Leonard led the Clippers with 34 points, six rebounds, and five assists as Paul George (20 points, eight rebounds, eight assists) and James Harden (20 points, seven rebounds, seven assists) totaled 40 points. Anfernee Simons led Portland with a season-high 38 points while Shaedon Sharpe totaled 27 points and six assists as the Blazers made a season-high 19 3PT FGs collectively. The Clippers have now won four games in a row and improve to 12-10 on the year as the Blazers move to 6-16.
